author: Fextralife
description:
First Berserker Khazan Dual Wield Build Guide - Best Skills, Combos & Sets
In this The First Berserker Khazan video, I'm going to kind of walk you guys through my Dual Wield build, what carried me through the game. There are definitely multiple ways you can play the Dual Wield. I think the general combat style is going to be the same more or less for most players, but you may pick and choose different sets with different skills that you like. But I kinda want to walk you through the fundamentals of what I found to work for the Dual Wield.

Wiki: https://firstberserkerkhazan.wiki.fextralife.com/First+Berserker+Khazan+Wiki

0:00 - Khazan Dual Wield Guide

11:26 - Armor Sets
14:39 - Phantoms
